item.title: Text mining in R
item.description: Sentiment analysis provides a way to understand the attitudes and opinions expressed in texts. In this post, we explored how to approach sentiment analysis using tidy data principles; when text data is in a tidy data structure, sentiment analysis can be implemented as an inner join. We can use sentiment analysis to understand how a narrative arc changes throughout its course or what words with emotional and opinion content are important for a particular text.
